title: There's No Longterm Plan For Long COVID
description: Our producer, Sinduja Srinivasan, reports on long COVID, and how our health care system might cope with so many patients with ongoing symptoms.
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, Anna Rothschild
itunes:summary: Our producer, Sinduja Srinivasan, reports on long COVID, and how our health care system might cope with so many patients with ongoing symptoms.
